text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Sol Doek mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ mangɨ me mɨsueghtɨ me arɨghiregh.” Ezɨ Doek raghɨrɨgha ghua ofa gamir gumaziba bar me mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghire. Dughiar kamra a Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ofa gamir gumazir 85pla mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghire. Gumazir kaba, me ofa gamir gumazir korotiar otevir azenan azuiba.
